author: armin

comments.content: Wow. The Type ID Board, stumped?!
Well, the Type ID Board can only ID **type** … This might be lettering. ;-)
The H might be custom, but the “unter” looks pretty mechanic and out-of-the-box. You can even tell a little bit of a different execution between the two elements.
Agreed. Still, I have no idea.
